text:
Hi <@U0379DEL3QA> there are 3 places to update templates and none have an option for these two templates unless I've completely missed something (I've implemented several membership portals and would love to have this option as well)

1 - settings - domains & urls - pages - system pages

2 - settings - domains & urls - private content - pages

3 - marketing - email - subscriptions

I would suggest adding this as an idea in the community
